statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT customer_id, rating FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating >= 4
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CustomerFeedback
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 101 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_feedbacks FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM CustomerFeedback GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_text ILIKE '%great%' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM feedback_and_reviews WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT feedback, rating FROM feedback_and_reviews WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, average_rating FROM customer_ratings WHERE total_reviews > 10;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback, rating FROM feedback_and_reviews ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_ratings WHERE average_rating < 4;
SELECT * FROM feedback_and_reviews WHERE feedback_id = 1 AND rating > 3;
SELECT customer_id, feedback FROM feedback_and_reviews ORDER BY rating DESC, feedback_id ASC;
SELECT customer_name, total_reviews FROM customer_ratings WHERE average_rating > 4.5;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, rating FROM feedback_and_reviews WHERE rating BETWEEN 3 AND 4 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback_and_reviews WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customer_ratings WHERE total_reviews > 10) ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM feedback_reviews;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM feedback_reviews WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_contacts ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM feedback_reviews WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_text, rating, sentiment_analysis FROM feedback_reviews JOIN feedback_analysis ON feedback_reviews.feedback_id = feedback_analysis.feedback_id;
SELECT * FROM feedback_reviews WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customer_contacts WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT feedback_id, sentiment_analysis, positive_feedback_count FROM feedback_analysis WHERE positive_feedback_count > negative_feedback_count ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM feedback_reviews fr JOIN customer_contacts cc ON fr.customer_id = cc.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customer_contacts cc JOIN feedback_reviews fr ON cc.customer_id = fr.customer_id WHERE rating < 3;
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customer ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT brand_name, reputation_score FROM brand_reputation WHERE reputation_score < 4.5;
SELECT review_text, review_date FROM review ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT CONCAT(first_name, ' ', last_name) AS full_name, email FROM customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT review_text, review_date FROM review WHERE review_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT brand_name, reputation_score FROM brand_reputation WHERE brand_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY reputation_score DESC;
SELECT feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE feedback_id IN (SELECT feedback_id FROM review);
SELECT * FROM feedback_reviews
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT brand_name, industry FROM brands ORDER BY industry DESC
SELECT feedback, date_received FROM brand_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 1001
SELECT brand_id, reputation_score, rating_distribution FROM brand_reputation
SELECT * FROM feedback_reviews WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY date_posted DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT brand_name, industry FROM brands ORDER BY industry ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT feedback, date_received FROM brand_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 1001
SELECT brand_id, reputation_score FROM brand_reputation WHERE reputation_score < 4.5
